Package ch.iserver.ace.net.discovery

The package ch.iserver.ace.net.discovery contains the implementation of the user discovery service.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DiscoveryCallbackAdapter Interface between Bonjour related classes and the network layer.
DiscoveryManager Handles the management of RemoteUserProxy and RemoteUserSession objects.
PeerDiscovery The PeerDiscovery interface enables to start and stop the peer discovery process by means of Bonjour technology.
UserRegistration This interface declares the functionality that needs to be used in order to register the local user with DNSSD.
 

Class Summary
AbstractQueryListener AbstractQueryListener gathers functionality used by all DNSSD query listeners.
Bonjour Bonjour is the default implementation for interface Discovery.
BonjourFactory Implementation of DiscoveryFactory for the Bonjour discovery implementation.
DiscoveryLauncher The DiscoveryLauncher initializes and starts the automatic and dynamic discovery process in a separate thread.
DiscoveryManagerFactory Factory class for the DiscoveryManager implementation and the DiscoveryCallbackAdapter implementation.
ExplicitUserDiscovery ExplicitUserDiscovery takes over the task of explicitly discovering a user given an IP address and a port.
IPQueryListener Extension listener of AbstractQueryListener for IP address query results.
TXTQueryListener Extension listener of AbstractQueryListener for TXT query results.
 

Package ch.iserver.ace.net.discovery Description

The package ch.iserver.ace.net.discovery contains the implementation of the user discovery service.
